name: retroversion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a body part, especially the uterus (= the organ where a baby develops)) the state of sloping backwards or a example of this: Retroversion of the uterus may occur due to weakening of the pelvic ligaments. In retroversions, the uterus revolves forward, and then glides downward.
More examplesFewer examplesA full bladder may mimic retroversion clinically.This helps pull the mobile uterus out of retroversion.Retroversion of the proximal femur significantly increased the magnitude of mean peak joint pressure.
